item.title: I was in the Bataclan
item.author: Aishwarya Pattar,Ollie Kemsley,
item.description: I was inside Bataclan when the attack happened. At around 9:45pm there was the sound of something like firecrackers coming from the back of the hall. The band stopped, all of the lights came on suddenly, I looked over my shoulder and, to my horror, I could see three figures with machine guns â€¦
